main event: Bright glaring green objects descended on Mexico, Maine, observed for almost two weeks including a specific sighting on December 21, 1956, reported to the USAF.
interesting points: Senator Margaret Chase Smith forwarded the report to the USAF,The sighting was observed over a period of time, not just a single event,Some indications pointed to possible ball lightning as a cause, but it was suspected to be a hallucination,The source of the report, a housewife, believed she witnessed a flying saucer landing near her children's swing set.
